page.title: 05GAMEKEEPING
page.content: {Gamekeeping in the woodlands.} Mr Edwards is gamekeeper of 950 acres which includes Coton Farm and the Shotatton farms. He buys day old pheasant chicks and rears them under a calor gas heater.He buys 750 chicks. They are 6 weeks old when they are put out into the wild. There are 8-10 guns in the shoot and 420 pheasants are shot. They also shoot wild duck and partridge. {THE COALMAN.}Mr Edwards, the coalman, has had his business in Ruyton XI Towns for 30 years.Two men work for him and he sells about 5,000 tons of coal a year.The area to which he delivers is Bagley, Baschurch, Bomere Heath, Cockshutt, Grafton, Hadnall, Knockin, Myddle, Nesscliffe, Old Woods, Ruyton XI Towns,Walford, Wem, West Felton,Wykey and Weston Lullingfield.
